sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the replantation of lamina and spinous process during laminoplasty in posterior thoracolumbar surgery.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨棘突椎板回植椎管成形在胸腰椎后路手术的应用价值.

sentences.en: Palpation a step - off, or gross misalignment of the spinous processes may also reveal extensive underlying injury.
sentences.cn: 触诊发现脊柱椎体错位或棘突序列不良也能显示广泛的潜在性损伤.

sentences.en: The C 2 spinous process was pushed ventrally to achieve ideal reduction.
sentences.cn: 将C2棘突向腹侧推以达到理想复位.

sentences.en: the spinous process of a bone
We can see spinous pollen grain in the fruit by microscope.
sentences.cn: 显微观察可见,果中的刺球状花粉粒最为显著.
